intro: Impatiens gongchengensis, commonly known as the Gongcheng Impatiens, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Balsaminaceae family and is characterized by its delicate, showy flowers that typically bloom in shades of pink and white. The plant features heart-shaped leaves and a short, upright stem, making it a striking addition to gardens. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
